Description: You enter the first room and are surprised to see its as if there was a whole world inside. There is nothing more than a boulder, an enemy, and grass as far as the eye can see.

You enter a dark forest. The air is thick and as the wind blows  the sound of the leaves rustling could be mistaken for eerie whispers. You hear water  running and notice a wide stream with a bridge running across. The boards for the bridge are worn, some missing, some hanging on by a thread. You notice a dark figure at the other end of the bridge.
Items: A small pouch of gold coins, A scroll to learn a skill in your race

Description: You step into a cave with barely enough room to walk upright. The air smells stale, and the ground is slippery with moisture. Strange symbols are etched on the cave walls, glowing faintly in the darkness. After walking the arrow passage you come to a blocked passage with tons of heavy rock, you could turn left or right.
Items: A glowing crystal that provides light, A medium strength weapon of your race, A potion of 100% avoidability for one attack

Description: As you enter the temple ruins, you see the remnants of an ancient civilization. Crumbling stone walls and broken statues loom around you. You feel the presence of magic in the air, and you sense this place has not been disturbed for centuries.
Items: An enchanted weapon for your class with a set bonus if wearing all enchanted equipment

Description: You reach the final chamber, a massive volcanic crater. The ground is cracked, with molten lava flowing in channels all around. The air is thick with smoke, and the heat burns your skin. At the center of the crater, a massive creature sleeps, surrounded by the treasures of fallen adventurers who never made it past this point
